From: "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbr@...>
> I missed something. What's wrong with "AccountTransferTest"? Is there
> already a class called "AccountTransfer"? If there is, then perhaps the
> class is misnamed.

No, there's no such class (maybe the design is calling for one?).
My point is that if I put all transfer related test cases into that class,
most of them use the two accounts of the fixture but one test case uses only
one account. If I put that test back into AccountTest than the name
AccountTransferTest seems to be misleading since the class does not hold all
transfer related tests.

Well, I guess I'm putting way too much stress onto a minor problem. I just
love to be consistent...

Johannes
